name: Cat's Out of the Bag!
description:
Cat's Out of the Bag! - a jam entry for the Bitsy Secret Jam 

Recommended listening / I made a soundtrack for the 'film':

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLMa6Poo_lV4hFCwGJ_QsbWzSs3kMqzL2K

Controls: Arrow keys

IMDB entry:

Cat's Out of the Bag! (1989) is a coming of age film following Cat, a shy teenager, who wreaks havoc by spreading her classmates' secrets around the school. The film received a Metacritic.com score of 21.

Game data available here: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B_wDEC2vxK3tV3pucGJoQjZTVUU
